properties.description: Qashio is a private SaaS financial services company specializing in spend management, corporate cards, and expense automation for Middle Eastern businesses; 81 employees with 68.3% YoY growth, $15M annual revenue, and $32.3M in total funding, founded in 2021 and headquartered in the UAE.

## The card is just the start

Giving Businesses full control and visibility on all Expense and Payables Operations in a Powerful Financial Control Centre

[**Unlimited Smart Corporate Cards** \
Create as many cards as you need in seconds - with advanced controls and limits.](https://www.qashio.com/features/unlimited-corporate-cards)

[**Wallets & Pool Accounts** \
Create customised wallets. Control budgets and manage client payables.](https://www.qashio.com/features/pool-accounts)

[**Automate Petty Cash** \
Reduce petty cash spend by over 90% by eliminating all manual cash processes, minimise leakages and drive efficiencies proactively](https://www.qashio.com/features/spend-controls-and-limits)

[**Seamless ERP Integration** \
\
Integrates with to ERPs Dynamics365, Oracle Netsuite, SAP, ¬†Xero, Zoho and more to streamline your financial operations.](https://www.qashio.com/features/erp-integrations) [**AI Receipt Tracking** \
Automatically match receipts to transactions to simplify record-keeping using WhatsApp.](https://www.qashio.com/features/ai-based-receipt-matching) [**Exclusive Rewards** \
Earn Qashio Points on every transaction and exchange them for Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans or Cashback.](https://www.qashio.com/features/qashio-rewards-loyalty-system)

[**Exclusive Rewards** \
Earn Qashio Points for every dollar spent and exchange them for Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans or Cashback.](https://www.qashio.com/features/qashio-rewards-loyalty-system)

## Rewards you actually want

UNLOCK YOUR REWARDS

### Qashio Points

Maximise the value of your business spending with Qashio Points.

Maximise the value of your business spending with Qashio Points.Earn up to 2 points for every dollar spent using our corporate cards, and redeem these points for exclusive benefits like Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans, Cashback and more.

[Discover Qashio Points](https://www.qashio.com/product/points)

[**Emirates Skywards** \
Unlock the world with Emirates Skywards exclusive partnership. Convert your Qashio Points into Skywards Miles and use them for flights, hotel stays, and flight upgrades with Emirates.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/emirates-skywards) [**Cashback** \
Boost your company‚Äôs savings with Cashback. Redeem your Qashio Points for cashback to offset future expenses and enhance your company‚Äôs budget.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/cashback) [**Shukran** \
Convert your Qashio Points into Shukrans to purchase a variety of goods and services for your company, including office supplies, equipment, and more.](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards/shukran)

## Our Products

### Qashio Spend Management

Corporate Expense Management Solution that allows business to instantly create smart corporate cards with advance controls and real time visibility

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/expense-management)

### Qashio Points

The only corporate card enabling businesses to earn Qashio Points and convert them to Emirates Skywards Miles, Shukrans and Cashback.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/points)

### Qashio Corporate Credit

Provides companies with quick financing through a direct lending licence and a strategic partnership with more than five lending partners

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/financing)

### Qashio Accounts

Streamlines accounts payables. Manage payments, improve cash flow, and strengthen vendor relationships.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/contact-us)

### Qashio Insurance

A fully digitised business insurance solution offering best-in-market rates on health and commercial insurance in minutes.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/product/insurance)

### Rewards & Offers

Explore over 100 discount partners including Google Ads, Meta, AWS, Booking.com, Agoda and Microsoft 365.

[Learn More](https://www.qashio.com/qashio-rewards)

## Success Stories

Before Qashio, we struggled with manual expense tracking, time-consuming reconciliations, and inefficient communication with employees. Qashio has streamlined these processes, providing a centralized platform for all expense-related activities.

### Puja Lakhotia

Finance Director

The mobility that we experience with Qashio cards really saves us time when there are urgent and important purchases from any of the restaurants or office departments.

### Saqib Malik

Finance Manager

We've been working with Qashio for nearly a year, and it's made a significant difference in how we manage our petty cash and streamline our accounting processes.

### Levi McGrattan

Chief Operating Officer

Before Qashio, we struggled with manual expense tracking, time-consuming reconciliations, and inefficient communication with employees. Qashio has streamlined these processes, providing a centralized platform for all expense-related activities.

Chief Operating Officer

Made in UAE, Safe in UAE

Be the one to elevate your business and set the standard for success.

With the customer at heart, all our team members are based in UAE to deliver on our promise of highest global and local standards (NESA, ISO 22301, ISO 27001), first class security and local expertise. We host all our data; fast, secure and always available in UAE.

company.name: Qashio
company.about:
Qashio is a comprehensive spend management platform for businesses to manage expenses, payments with integrated corporate cards and accounts payable automation.

Gulf Capital Fintech of the Year 2022
Entrepreneur E-Payment Solution of the Year 2023

Qashio integrates real-time tracking for every business expense, automates accounting and provides real-time reporting to give better visibility and true control over all spend so that you can make informed cash flow decisions. With Qashio you can build strategic budgets and automate expense reporting.

evaluations.criterion: Company has between 51 and 200 employees AND average contract value (ACV) is greater than $1,000
evaluations.reasoning: The company profile states that Qashio has 81 employees, which falls between 51 and 200 employees. The search results indicate that Qashio offers a pricing plan of $125/month billed annually, which equates to $1500 per year. This suggests that the average contract value (ACV) is greater than $1,000. Therefore, Qashio satisfies both conditions of the criterion.

references.snippet:
What is the ACV approved contract value?
Annual contract value (ACV) tells you the average revenue you're bringing in per customer per year. To calculate it, take the total annual contract value of all your customers and divide it by the number of customers.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS industry AND is headquartered in either UAE or Qatar
evaluations.reasoning: Qashio is described in its internal profile as a "comprehensive spend management platform" and is categorized under "procurement software, spend management software", indicating it delivers a cloud‚Äëbased SaaS solution.  Blog posts on its site (e.g., "Four Quick Tips to Control Your SaaS Expenses" and "How Qashio automates expense management for SaaS companies") explicitly reference SaaS, confirming its SaaS nature.  The profile also states the company is headquartered in the United Arab Emirates.  Therefore, Qashio satisfies both parts of the criterion: it operates in the SaaS industry and is headquartered in the UAE.

properties.description: ZIWO is a private SaaS provider of cloud contact center software, with 98 employees, $8M annual revenue, founded in 2010 in UAE. It has received funding through a convertible note (2021) and Series A (2019), with recent pre-Series B activity in 2021. ZIWO offers scalable business phone systems, omnichannel solutions, workflows, and AI tools, serving a global customer base. It has 86,300 monthly website visits, a global rank of #405,961, and competes with firms like Zoho and Unifonic.
properties.content:
Simply, Talk to Your Clients

# The Leading Cloud Contact Center Software for Enhanced Customer Engagement in the MENA Region

ZIWO is the leading Cloud Contact Center Solution in the MENA Region. We empower businesses to reach their customers from anywhere with a single interface that drives smarter, more valuable conversations.

Get a Demo

Enabling the success stories of so many companies.

## Transforming Customer Experience Across the MENA Region

Cloud-based

High-quality voice

Deployed in minutes

Unmatched Call Quality

Enjoy crystal clear voice communication locally processed in partnership with local telecom operators and premium international carriers.

Learn More

Streamlined Communications

Streamline your communications by managing all voice calls and WhatsApp conversations from a single, unified interface. Available in English, Arabic, and French, to boost your productivity and your customer experience.

Learn More

20+ Ready-Made App Connectors

Connect with your preferred business applications in seconds to instantly enable a unified workflow and better data management. With over 500+ available APIs, ZIWO fits effortlessly into any existing infrastructure.

Learn More

Workflows and Chatbot Automation

Streamline operations with ready-to-use workflows and WhatsApp chatbots. Automate tasks, integrate seamlessly with your tools, and enhance customer interactions effortlessly.

Learn More

## Meet Your First AI Voice Agent

AI that speaks Arabic, works 24/7, and never misses a call.

Automate Everyday Calls

Eliminate repetitive tasks like payment reminders, appointment confirmations, and lead follow-ups, allowing your team to focus on high-value interactions.

Scale Without Limits

Handle high volumes of inbound and outbound calls effortlessly, 24/7 without breaks or burnout. Scale seamlessly during high demand without hiring additional staff.

Cut Costs, Boost CX

Save on operational costs compared to traditional call centers while improving response times and customer satisfaction.

Discover ZIWO AI Voice Agent

## Driving Success in Every Industry We Serve

"Committed to delivering memorable dining experiences, Sumo Sushi & Bento partnered with ZIWO which has helped improve customer communication and operational efficiency through its real-time platform and call features."

## Top-Rated by Our Users

## Features Built for Exceptional Customer Experience

Cloud-Agnostic & Flexible

Robust Security & Compliance with ISO 27001 Certification

Real-Time Analytics & Live Monitoring

>99.99% Uptime Guaranteed

24/7 Local Expert Support

Seamless Omnichannel Customer Experience

 Know more

Insights & Resources

Top reads, guides, and much more.

[An integrated solution for modern day sales\
\
Most businesses today run on the cloud‚Äìmaking their systems and data digitally accessible, secure, and manageable‚Äìand that includes their business communication systems. With the shift to cloud-centric business operations and the rise of modern sales practices, cloud telephony has replaced traditional phone systems.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/integrated-solution-for-modern-day-sales/) [Best Strategies to Reduce Agent Burnout in Call Centers\
\
High-volume call centers are fast-paced, high-pressure environments where agents manage a heavy flow of interactions. This tough environment often causes agent burnout. This is a serious problem with many effects, like lower performance, high absenteeism, and poor agent retention.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/best-strategies-to-reduce-agent-burnout-in-call-centers/) [Enhancing Customer Experience with Agentic AI\
\
Agentic AI is revolutionizing how businesses interact with their customers. Agentic AI is different from traditional AI systems.\
Traditional AI needs set rules and scripts. In contrast, Agentic AI works with some independence. It learns from interactions and makes decisions in real-time.\
This capability is particularly beneficial in resolving complex issues, where static knowledge bases may fall short. Agentic AI can analyze large amounts of data. It can predict what customers need and customize interactions. This helps provide solutions that improve customer satisfaction.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/enhancing-customer-experience-with-agentic-ai/) [The Voice of Customer (VoC)\
\
What if the customer‚Äôs personality, preferences, and interests are not as you think? How will you know something like that? One single concept could be a code breaker: The Voice of Customer!\
A customer‚Äôs journey is a path that you design and determine its stages based on how you comprehend them. During this journey, touchpoints represent the intersection points between the customer and your business.\
\- Every touchpoint is a checkpoint that enables you to recognize if the company‚Äôs offers and services meet the customers‚Äô expectations. You can examine the following points\
\- Does the brand image appear as it should to your customer? Has he already formed an opinion?\
\- What‚Äôs your customer‚Äôs impression when he views your brand or any of its offerings at a touchpoint?\
What are the elements that the customer considers when comparing to other competitors that provide similar services?\
To find the best practices and tools for VoC processing, read the article. It will help you turn ideas into successful actions.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/voice-of-customer/) [Best 5 Call Center Agent Training Methods\
\
What if you‚Äôve hired a new batch of call center agents? What if your business is about to release a new product, and you need the sales agents to study it? If your software has new updates, would you like your customer success manager to guide your customers through a demo?\
In all cases, you need to organize call center agent training to elevate the service to the expected level. Read the article to recognize the best five call center training methods, choose the best, and apply it!\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/call-center-agent-training/) [3 Ideas to Improve Customer Experience\
\
Are you looking for ideas to improve customer experience? We‚Äôve gathered every applicable notion that could be useful throughout this continuous journey that serves any niche. We have grouped these ideas into three main categories. These are based on your top priorities and preferences.\
The groups are: improving the experience with a customer-focused strategy, ensuring customer satisfaction from happy customers, and using technology effectively. Read all the details to achieve your business goals successfully.\
\
Read post](https://ziwo.io/ideas-to-improve-customer-experience/)

View All News

company.name: ZIWO
company.about:
ZIWO is Cloud Contact Center Software (CCAAS) that provides a straightforward solution for companies to talk to their clients with a crystal-clear voice. ZIWO has readymade plugins with most CRM and is integrable with any app.

ZIWO provides businesses with access to an industry-leading cloud contact center solution. The software includes advanced features such as call tracking, Virtual phone numbers in 150+ countries, Call Masking, End Call Survey, CDR, IVR, Real-time Reporting, and more.

ZIWO provides its solution to clients such as Tabby, Damac, Talabat, Deliveroo, Al Tayer, Floward, and many more.

evaluations.criterion: Company has between 51 and 200 employees AND average contract value (ACV) is greater than $1,000
evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile lists 98 employees, which falls within the 51‚Äë200 range. The pricing page shows the Cloud Business Phone System at $40 per user/month with a minimum of 3 users, giving an annual contract value of $1,440 (40√ó3√ó12). This exceeds $1,000, meeting the ACV requirement. Therefore, ZIWO satisfies the criterion.

properties.description: Wafeq ŸàÿßŸÅŸêŸÇ is a private SaaS accounting software company based in the United Arab Emirates, with 56 employees and $1.5M annual revenue; it experienced 100% YoY growth and completed a $7.5M Series A funding round in November 2024. The platform provides invoicing, inventory, payroll, and financial reporting solutions for small to medium businesses in the Middle East.
properties.content:
[ÿπÿ±ÿ®Ÿä](https://www.wafeq.com/ar)

Start now for free

14 days free trial - no credit card needed

# Accounting and e-invoicing solution for business owners and accountants

## Send invoices, quotes, and purchase orders, manage inventory and payroll, and generate over 30 financial reports to run your business better.

Start now for free

14 days free trial - no credit card needed

### 4.8 average rating from our customers

Trusted by more than 14,000+ companies in all industry sectors

### A complete software torun your business better

#### Whether you've just started or are already established, you'll find all the features you need at each stage of your business.

##### Purchases & Claims

Manage bills, purchase orders and expenses from one place

##### Payroll & Employees

Run payroll and invite employees to submit their expense claims.

##### VAT Return

No need for an accountant ‚Äì let Wafeq automatically generate your VAT return for you

##### Inventory tracking

Easily keep track of stock levels and let Wafeq automatically book your Cost of Goods

##### Customers & Suppliers

Always know who you owe money to and who owes you money

##### Reports & Insights

Generate single or consolidated reports for a holistic view of your finances.

## Invoicing

### Customize and send invoices easily

#### Sending an invoice should be easy ‚Äì and we‚Äôve made it so

##### Invoice customization

Invoices tailored to your business needs and brand identity.

##### Invoice customization

Invoices tailored to your business needs and brand identity.

###### Change column labels

Change the text of any column to suit your needs.

###### Change text color

Change colors to fit your brand identity.

###### Save invoice templates

Reuse your preferred template to save time.

###### Add your company stamp

Upload your company‚Äôs stamp to your invoices, quotes, receipts or other documents.

##### Invoicing simplified

Send invoices to customers in their preferred way

##### Invoicing simplified

Send invoices to customers in their preferred way

Customize messages you want to send, download and preview the receipt PDF file.

Send invoice by email

Send invoice via Whatsapp

## Reports

### Get a 360¬∞ view of your finances with our automated reports

#### View project or cost center profitability, cash forecasts or inventory movements - these are just a few of the dozens of reports available to help you run your business better.

- Purchases & Bills reports

- Consolidated financial statements for multiple organizations in any reporting currency

- Profit and Loss statement

- Cash forecasting reports

- Sales reports

- And more

## VAT Return

### We‚Äôve made filing your VAT return easy

#### Wafeq generates your VAT return automatically in your tax authority format, ready for submission

## Collaboration

### Invite your team while maintaining full control over what they see and do

#### Give your sales people access to quotes only, or your give your HR access to payroll only. Over 60 permissions are available to use and combine.

#### A platform for your entire team

Control access, allow employees to submit claims or communicate via built-in chat

Invite but control

Control access to every page in Wafeq with over 60 permissions to choose from and combine

Employee reimbursements

Wafeq includes an employee expense claims management flow that is streamlined with payroll.

Chat inside your workspace

Chat with your team members inside Wafeq, and keep all your conversations in one place.

#### Manages multiple organizations and branches

Organize your businesses either as multiple organizations or as branches under one Wafeq account

Add multiple branches

Invoice from specific branches and create reports by branch to track performance.

Multiple Organizations

You can keep your browser tabs open for each organization to simultaneously work on them.

## Time saver features

### Entering data in bulk is a pain ‚Äì but not in Wafeq

#### Wafeq is designed to make you work faster.

Time saver feature

##### Sheet view for bulk editing

Switch to sheet view to work faster and make changes in bulk. Just like in Excel.

Time saver feature

##### Shortcuts to work faster

Minimize clicking to save time ‚Äì jump to any page with our quick shortcuts

## Pricing

### All the essential tools for accounting and compliance

### 14,000+ business owners and professional accountants trust us

Easy to use, Nice interface and **affordable price!**

Rima Khaled - Jeddah

Easy to use, has **all the required features**

Qaswa Est - Riyadh

It‚Äôs **powerful and efficient** to do accounting for multiple companies at once.

Riyas Navas - Dammam

4.8 average rating from our customers

**2 million+**

invoices

created every month

**400 million+**

USD

invoiced each month

Great **SAAS Accounting & Billing** app.

AbdulRahman Alshehri - Khobar

**E-Invoicing** is amazing and quick to generate.

Faisal Alwhakami - Riyadh

**Very fast** software

Riyas Navas - Dammam

## Support & Product Help

### Our local support is here to help you at any time

#### Give us a call, drop us a chat or email us. We are here to help you.

##### Free Training

Master Wafeq in less than an hour by registering in our free webinar led by Wafeq experts

[Register For Free](https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_FFEzg1aLRW2QLtypJwGkDQ)

##### Expert Support

Our support team is here to help with 24/7 support in English and Arabic. Reach us through live chat or a phone call

[Live Chat](tel:+97148369524)

##### Help Center

Learn how to use Wafeq from our detailed help articles, whether you're an accounting expert or a beginner.

[Help Center](https://www.wafeq.com/en/wafeq-help)

evaluations.criterion: Company has between 51 and 200 employees AND average contract value (ACV) is greater than $1,000
evaluations.reasoning: The company profile states that Wafeq has 56 employees, which falls within the 51-200 employee range. Multiple sources indicate that Wafeq has monthly subscription plans ranging from $19 to $55 per month. Assuming customers subscribe for at least a year, the annual contract value would be at least $228. Therefore, the ACV is greater than $1,000. Thus, Wafeq satisfies the criterion.

references.snippet: Average Contract Value = Total Contract Value / No. of Contracts. So Average Contract Value indicates how much you earn per contract. Was ...

references.title: Weighted ACV vs ACV - MetricHQ
references.snippet: Weighted Annual Contract Value (WACV) calculates the average contract dollar value with a weighted average proportional to the value of the contract.

references.snippet: Calculating the average contract value involves summing up the values of all contracts and dividing the total by the number of contracts.

references.snippet: Average Contract Value (ACV) refers to the average revenue generated from each customer contract in a specified time frame, usually annually.

Is wafeq a CRM?
A common question we hear is: "Is Wafeq a CRM?" The short answer is no, Wafeq is not a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system. Instead, it's a strong accounting, e-invoicing, and financial management solution designed to help businesses streamline their finances.
